Template.Text:
<v-container >
    <v-card-text>
        <v-row justify="center">
            <v-col cols="12">
                <two-lists-draggable :list1="list1" 
                                     :list2="list2"
                                     title1="Title 1"
                                     title2="Title 2"
                                     hint1="Hint 1"
                                     hint2="Hint 2"
                                     :error-messages="errorMessages">
                </two-lists-draggable>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="8">
                <sort-draggable :list="list1"
                                title="Title 1"
                                hint="Hint 1">
                </sort-draggable>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-card-text>
</v-container>

<v-container >
  <v-card-text>
    <v-row justify="center">
      <v-col cols="12">
        <two-lists-draggable :list1="list1" 
                             :list2="list2" 
                             title1="Title 1"
                             title2="Title 2"
                             hint1="Hint 1"
                             hint2="Hint 2"
                             :error-messages="errorMessages">
        </two-lists-draggable>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="8">
        <sort-draggable :list="list1"
                        title="Title 1"
                        hint="Hint 1">
        </sort-draggable>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-card-text>
</v-container>
